articles.description: The Metroidvania Pac-Man game Shadow Labyrinth comes to Nintendo Switch 2 (and Switch) - this review covers the title in detail.
articles.content:
System: Switch 2 (also on Switch)Release date: July 17, 2025Developer: Bandai NamcoPublisher: Bandai Namco
I wish I could have been a fly on the wall during the pitch meeting for Shadow Labyrinth. O… [+15100 chars]
